metadata.name: executive_function
metadata.title: Executive Functioning Assessment
metadata.description: This assessment focuses on your executive functioning skills, including planning, adaptability, problem-solving, impulse control, and decision-making.

title: Executive Functioning Assessment
description: This assessment focuses on your executive functioning skills, including planning, adaptability, problem-solving, impulse control, and decision-making.
completedHtml: Thank you for completing the Executive Functioning Assessment!

elements.name: intro_text
elements.title: This assessment focuses on your executive functioning skills, including planning, adaptability, problem-solving, impulse control, and decision-making. You will complete a mix of tasks and questions designed to provide insight into these skills.

elements.name: planning_skills
elements.title: How effective are you at planning and organizing tasks?

elements.name: problem_solving_confidence
elements.title: How confident do you feel when faced with complex problems?

elements.name: task_approach
elements.title: When you have a task to complete with a set deadline, how do you tend to approach it?
choices: Start immediately and adjust as I go
Break it into smaller tasks first
Wait until I feel ready or motivated

elements.name: adaptability
elements.title: How easily do you adapt when plans or tasks change unexpectedly?

elements.name: decision_making_pressure
elements.title: How comfortable are you making quick decisions under pressure?

elements.name: multi_step_tasks
elements.title: How often do you break down tasks into smaller steps?

elements.name: acting_on_ideas
elements.title: When I come up with a new idea, I act on it.
choices: Only if I have a solid plan in place
I prefer to brainstorm with others first

elements.name: planning_ahead
elements.title: How often do you plan ahead before starting a major task or project?

elements.name: prioritizing_tasks
elements.title: How well do you prioritize tasks when you have multiple responsibilities at the same time?

elements.name: impulse_control
elements.title: How often do you find yourself making impulsive decisions, even if they might impact the outcome of a task?

elements.name: task_strategy_reflection
elements.title: When youâ€™re working on a challenging task, how likely are you to change your approach if you encounter obstacles?

elements.name: time_management
elements.title: How would you rate your time management skills?

elements.name: dealing_with_distractions
elements.title: How effectively do you handle distractions when focusing on a task?

elements.name: feedback
elements.title: Is there anything you found particularly challenging or interesting about this assessment?
